dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Net Result
dmca.body:
NetResult
Intellectual Property Protection

Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
SW6 5UA
Tel: 020 7471 1733
http://www.nr-online.com

Dear Sir,

Please see the site http://cricketlivematches.blogspot.com/ which is infringing the copyright of our client, Cricket Australia, by offering live streams of the Commonwealth Bank Cricket Series between Australia and England. Please have the site remove all links to this cricket series as soon as possible.

I, Mike Kiernan, hereby state that Cricket Australia is the owner of the exclusive rights referenced above and that NetResult is authorized to act on its behalf with respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of Cricket Australia, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of the content in manner complained of is not authorized by Cricket Australia, its agents, or the law.

I, Mike Kiernan, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.

Please contact me at the details below if you have any further questions.

Regards,

Mike Kiernan
